resources.string: Rolling World
Perform
ALWAYS TRY TO PERFORM WITH A COMFORTABLE TEMPO
BE EMOTIONAL IF YOU FEEL GOOD
USE DIFFERENT LAYERS OF RHYTHM TO MAKE VARIANCE
TAKE USE OF FEATURES FOR DIFFERENT DEVICES
BE HAPPY TO CREATE YOUR OWN MASTERPIECE
CASUAL PERCUSSION
1. Access performance mode by clicking top-right button
2. When you are in performance mode, touch "Click" to start performance
3. Adjust position of your phone as you wish
4. Touch screen to generate sound effect and consecutive touch will not interrupt sound.
5. Double short touch will clear exist image, don\'t worry about audio functionality
FINGER DRAWING
1. Use Processing IDE to start server
2. Check the IP address of your laptop and port number
3. Remember port number to enable it in your firewall
4. Access laptop\'s IP address with port number via Safari on your iPad or iPhone
5. Touch screen to generate symmetric graphics
6. Remember that audio can be controlled by speed and position of your finger, so perform casually to create your own masterpiece
KEYBOARD CREATOR
1. Start from packaged application
2. Click different decks to start different rhythm
3. Drag mouse will influence the speed of rhythm.
4. Use keyboard to control instrument as well as decks as an asset
5. Enjoy your play and improvisation
